typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		driverId as integer,
		name as string,
		ssn as string,
		location as string,
		certified as boolean,
		{wage-plan} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> driversCSV
source(output(
		driverId as integer,
		week as integer,
		{hours-logged} as integer,
		{miles-logged} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> timesheetCSV
timesheetCSV aggregate(groupBy(driverId),
	sum_hourslogged = sum({hours-logged}),
		sum_mileslogged = sum({miles-logged})) ~> SumHoursAndMiles
driversCSV, SumHoursAndMiles join(driversCSV@driverId == SumHoursAndMiles@driverId,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'none')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		driverId = driversCSV@driverId,
		name,
		ssn,
		location,
		certified,
		{wage-plan},
		driverId = SumHoursAndMiles@driverId,
		sum_hourslogged,
		sum_mileslogged
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
